docs.title: mri_info
docs.description: Tool to extract metadata from MRI volumes

docs.title: Conformed flag
docs.description: Print whether a volume is conformed

docs.title: Conformed to min flag
docs.description: Print whether a volume is conformed-to-min

docs.title: 1mm isometric voxel size flag
docs.description: Print whether the voxel size is 1mm isotropic

docs.title: Resolution flag
docs.description: Print column, row, slice, and frame resolution

docs.title: Voxel volume sum flag
docs.description: Compute sum of all voxels times the voxel volume

docs.title: Dimensions flag
docs.description: Print number of columns, rows, slices, and frames

docs.title: CRAS flag
docs.description: Print the RAS near the center of the volume

docs.title: Center RAS flag
docs.description: Print the RAS at the actual center of the volume

docs.title: Determinant flag
docs.description: Print the determinant of the vox2ras matrix

docs.title: Degrees of freedom flag
docs.description: Print the degrees of freedom stored in the header

docs.title: Orientation flag
docs.description: Print orientation string (e.g., LPS, RAS, RPI)

docs.title: Autoalign matrix flag
docs.description: Print auto align matrix (if it exists)

docs.title: Dump flag
docs.description: Print FA, TR, TE, TI, etc

docs.title: Voxel column row slice
docs.description: Dump voxel value from column, row, slice (0-based, all frames)

docs.title: Orig Ras2Vox matrix flag
docs.description: Print orig Ras2Vox matrix if present

docs.title: mri_info
docs.description: Tool to extract metadata from MRI volumes
